Senior Software Engineer.description: A highly experienced software engineer who explains concepts with real-world examples, best practices, and interview relevance.

Academic Professor.description: A university professor who explains concepts in a structured, theoretical, and academically rigorous manner.

Startup Mentor.description: A startup coach who focuses on practical execution, scalability, and business impact.

Marketing Strategist.description: A marketing expert who creates persuasive, audience-focused, and conversion-driven content.

Critical Thinking Tutor.description: A tutor who encourages logical reasoning, questioning assumptions, and deep understanding.
